Title: Extends DEC's authority to regulate management of crabs, and prohibits the taking of horseshoe crabs for commercial and biomedical purposes
Summary: Extends DEC's authority to regulate management of crabs to 12/31/2027; prohibits the taking of horseshoe crabs for commercial and biomedical purposes.
LawCode: Amd ยง13-0331, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to extending certain provisions relating to the department of environmental conservation's regulation of crabs, and to prohibiting the taking of horseshoe crabs for commercial and biomedical purposes
